sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.TASK_SMRY_INFO_VAL_TXT FROM TASK_SMRY_INFO A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.TASK_SMRY_INFO_TP_CD = #taskSmryInfoTpCd# ORDER BY A.TASK_SMRY_INFO_NUM

WITH TIER AS( SELECT OHSD.ORG_TIER_CD ,SDF.BR_FLG ,SDF.REP_FLG FROM STRU_DFN SDF ,ORG_HRCH_STRU_DFN OHSD WHERE SDF.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ( SDF.BR_FLG = 'Y' OR SDF.REP_FLG = 'Y') AND SDF.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OHSD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SDF.STRU_DFN_CD = OHSD.STRU_DFN_CD AND OHSD.BIZ_AREA_ORG_CD = #bizAreaOrdCd# AND SDF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND OHSD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND OHSD.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(OHSD.EFF_THRU_DT, #slsDt#) >= #slsDt# ) ,ORG_INFO AS( SELECT BR_NM ,TM_NM ,PSN_CD ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY BR_NM ORDER BY PSN_CD) AS BR_ROW_NUM ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TM_NM ORDER BY PSN_CD) AS TM_ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN BR.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.FIRST_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.FIRST_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.FIRST_ORG_NM WHEN BR.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.SCD_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.SCD_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.SCD_ORG_NM WHEN BR.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.THIRD_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.THIRD_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.THIRD_ORG_NM WHEN BR.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.FRTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.FRTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.FRTH_ORG_NM WHEN BR.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.FIFTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.FIFTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.FIFTH_ORG_NM WHEN BR.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.SIXTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.SIXTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.SIXTH_ORG_NM WHEN BR.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.SVNTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.SVNTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.SVNTH_ORG_NM WHEN BR.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.EIGHTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.EIGHTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.EIGHTH_ORG_NM WHEN BR.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.NINTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.NINTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.NINTH_ORG_NM WHEN BR.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.TENTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.TENTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.TENTH_ORG_NM WHEN BR.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.ELVTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.ELVTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.ELVTH_ORG_NM END AS BR_NM ,CASE WHEN TM.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.FIRST_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.FIRST_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.FIRST_ORG_NM WHEN TM.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.SCD_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.SCD_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.SCD_ORG_NM WHEN TM.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.THIRD_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.THIRD_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.THIRD_ORG_NM WHEN TM.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.FRTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.FRTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.FRTH_ORG_NM WHEN TM.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.FIFTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.FIFTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.FIFTH_ORG_NM WHEN TM.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.SIXTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.SIXTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.SIXTH_ORG_NM WHEN TM.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.SVNTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.SVNTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.SVNTH_ORG_NM WHEN TM.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.EIGHTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.EIGHTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.EIGHTH_ORG_NM WHEN TM.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.NINTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.NINTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.NINTH_ORG_NM WHEN TM.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.TENTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.TENTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.TENTH_ORG_NM WHEN TM.ORG_TIER_CD = ORG.ELVTH_ORG_TIER_CD AND ORG.ELVTH_ORG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN ORG.ELVTH_ORG_NM END AS TM_NM ,OFA.PSN_CD FROM S21_ORG ORG ,(SELECT * FROM TIER WHERE BR_FLG = 'Y') BR ,(SELECT * FROM TIER WHERE REP_FLG = 'Y') TM ,TOC TOC ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,ORG_FUNC_ROLE_TP RTP WHERE ORG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ORG.FIRST_ORG_CD = #firstOrgCd# AND ORG.RGTN_STS_CD = #rgtnStsCd# AND ORG.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ORG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ORG.TOC_CD = TOC.TOC_CD AND TOC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OFA.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TOC.TOC_CD = OFA.TOC_CD AND OFA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND OFA.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(OFA.EFF_THRU_DT, #slsDt#) >= #slsDt# AND TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RTP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TOC.ORG_FUNC_ROLE_TP_CD = RTP.ORG_FUNC_ROLE_TP_CD AND RTP.MGR_FLG = 'Y' AND RTP.TECH_MSTR_REQ_FLG = 'Y' AND RTP.ACTV_FLG = 'Y' AND RTP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) ) ,HLD_TASK AS( SELECT TASK.SVC_TASK_NUM ,VISIT.FSR_VISIT_STS_CD ,BR_ORG.PSN_CD SVC_BR_MGR_PSN_CD ,TM_ORG.PSN_CD SVC_TEAM_MGR_PSN_CD FROM SVC_TASK TASK ,FSR_VISIT VISIT ,SVC_MACH_MSTR MACH ,FSR FSR ,SHIP_TO_CUST SHIP ,SVC_BR_POST_XREF BPX9 ,SVC_BR_POST_XREF BPX5 ,ORG_INFO BR_ORG ,ORG_INFO TM_ORG WHERE TASK.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TASK.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TASK.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VISIT.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TASK.SVC_TASK_NUM = VISIT.SVC_TASK_NUM AND VISIT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND VISIT.FSR_VISIT_STS_CD IN (#pendingPo#, #creditHold#) AND TASK.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MACH.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TASK.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = MACH.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND MACH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TASK.GLBL_CMPY_CD = FSR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TASK.FSR_NUM = FSR.FSR_NUM AND FSR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND FSR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SHIP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND FSR.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD = SHIP.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD AND SHIP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND MACH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = BPX9.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND MACH.SVC_BY_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD = BPX9.SVC_LINE_BIZ_CD(+) AND MACH.FLD_SVC_BR_CD = BPX9.SVC_BR_CD(+) AND SHIP.POST_CD = BPX9.POST_CD(+) AND BPX9.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND MACH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = BPX5.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND MACH.SVC_BY_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD = BPX5.SVC_LINE_BIZ_CD(+) AND MACH.FLD_SVC_BR_CD = BPX5.SVC_BR_CD(+) AND SUBSTR(SHIP.POST_CD,0,5) = BPX5.POST_CD(+) AND BPX5.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND BR_ORG.BR_NM(+) = UPPER(NVL(BPX9.SVC_BR_CD_DESC_TXT, BPX5.SVC_BR_CD_DESC_TXT)) AND BR_ORG.BR_ROW_NUM(+) = 1 AND TM_ORG.TM_NM(+) = UPPER(NVL(BPX9.SVC_TEAM_TXT, BPX5.SVC_TEAM_TXT)) AND TM_ORG.TM_ROW_NUM(+) = 1 )
SELECT
/*+ DYNAMIC_SAMPLING(MN 5) */
ST.SVC_TASK_RCV_DT AS SVC_TASK_RCV_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_CLO_DT AS SVC_TASK_CLO_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_STS_CD AS SVC_TASK_STS_CD ,ST.SVC_TASK_REJ_DT AS SVC_TASK_REJ_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_APVL_DT AS SVC_TASK_APVL_DT ,ST.SVC_RSP_TM_NUM AS SVC_RSP_TM_NUM ,FV_SUB.TECH_CD AS TECH_CD ,STS.OPEN_TASK_FLG AS OPEN_TASK_FLG ,STH_SUB.SVC_TASK_REL_FLG AS SVC_TASK_REL_FLG ,SMM.DS_KEY_ACCT_FLG AS DS_KEY_ACCT_FLG ,F.SVC_CALL_SRC_TP_CD AS SVC_CALL_SRC_TP_CD ,SP.PSN_CD AS SVC_MGR_PSN_CD ,SO.UNIQ_ORG_LAYER_NUM AS MGR_ORG_LAYER_NUM ,SO.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,SO.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,SO.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,SO.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,SO.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,SO.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,SO.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,SO.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,SO.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,SO.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,SO.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,SO.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,SO.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,SO.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,SO.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,SO.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,SO.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,SO.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,SO.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,SO.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,SO.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,SO.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM ,ST.FSR_NUM AS FSR_NUM ,ST.SVC_TASK_NUM AS SVC_TASK_NUM ,F.ITT_NUM AS ITT_NUM ,F.FSR_STS_CD AS FSR_STS_CD ,FV_SUB.FSR_VISIT_STS_CD AS FSR_VISIT_STS_CD ,ST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AS SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,ST.SER_NUM AS SER_NUM ,MN.T_MDL_ID AS MDL_ID ,ST.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD ,ST.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD AS SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,ST.SO_NUM AS SO_NUM ,ST.CUST_TEL_NUM AS CUST_TEL_NUM ,SMM.BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_FROM_TM AS BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_FROM_TM ,SMM.BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_TO_TM AS BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_TO_TM ,ST.SVC_TASK_RCV_TM AS SVC_TASK_RCV_TM ,ST.DS_SVC_CALL_TP_CD AS DS_SVC_CALL_TP_CD ,ST.SVC_BILL_TP_CD AS SVC_BILL_TP_CD ,SM_SUB.SVC_CMNT_TXT AS SVC_CMNT_TXT ,ST.SVC_TASK_CPLT_DT AS SVC_TASK_CPLT_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_CPLT_TM AS SVC_TASK_CPLT_TM ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_TP_CD ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_LOC_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_LOC_TP_CD ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_RSN_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_RSN_TP_CD ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_CRCT_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_CRCT_TP_CD ,STH_SUB.SVC_TASK_REL_USR_ID AS CLTR_PSN_CD ,'01' AS SVC_MGR_TP_CD
,ST.LATE_START_TS AS LATE_START_TS
FROM SVC_TASK_STS STS ,SVC_TASK ST ,FSR F ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,MDL_NM MN ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO ,( $searchCondition00$ ) FV_SUB ,( $searchCondition01$ ) FVT_SUB ,( $searchCondition02$ ) STH_SUB ,( $searchCondition03$ ) SM_SUB WHERE $searchCondition04$ $searchCondition05$ $searchCondition06$ UNION ALL SELECT
/*+ DYNAMIC_SAMPLING(MN 5) */
ST.SVC_TASK_RCV_DT AS SVC_TASK_RCV_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_CLO_DT AS SVC_TASK_CLO_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_STS_CD AS SVC_TASK_STS_CD ,ST.SVC_TASK_REJ_DT AS SVC_TASK_REJ_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_APVL_DT AS SVC_TASK_APVL_DT ,ST.SVC_RSP_TM_NUM AS SVC_RSP_TM_NUM ,FV_SUB.TECH_CD AS TECH_CD ,STS.OPEN_TASK_FLG AS OPEN_TASK_FLG ,STH_SUB.SVC_TASK_REL_FLG AS SVC_TASK_REL_FLG ,SMM.DS_KEY_ACCT_FLG AS DS_KEY_ACCT_FLG ,F.SVC_CALL_SRC_TP_CD AS SVC_CALL_SRC_TP_CD ,SP.PSN_CD AS SVC_MGR_PSN_CD ,SO.UNIQ_ORG_LAYER_NUM AS MGR_ORG_LAYER_NUM ,SO.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,SO.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,SO.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,SO.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,SO.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,SO.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,SO.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,SO.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,SO.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,SO.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,SO.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,SO.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,SO.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,SO.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,SO.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,SO.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,SO.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,SO.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,SO.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,SO.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,SO.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,SO.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM ,ST.FSR_NUM AS FSR_NUM ,ST.SVC_TASK_NUM AS SVC_TASK_NUM ,F.ITT_NUM AS ITT_NUM ,F.FSR_STS_CD AS FSR_STS_CD ,FV_SUB.FSR_VISIT_STS_CD AS FSR_VISIT_STS_CD ,ST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AS SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,ST.SER_NUM AS SER_NUM ,MN.T_MDL_ID AS MDL_ID ,ST.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD ,ST.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD AS SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,ST.SO_NUM AS SO_NUM ,ST.CUST_TEL_NUM AS CUST_TEL_NUM ,SMM.BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_FROM_TM AS BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_FROM_TM ,SMM.BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_TO_TM AS BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_TO_TM ,ST.SVC_TASK_RCV_TM AS SVC_TASK_RCV_TM ,ST.DS_SVC_CALL_TP_CD AS DS_SVC_CALL_TP_CD ,ST.SVC_BILL_TP_CD AS SVC_BILL_TP_CD ,SM_SUB.SVC_CMNT_TXT AS SVC_CMNT_TXT ,ST.SVC_TASK_CPLT_DT AS SVC_TASK_CPLT_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_CPLT_TM AS SVC_TASK_CPLT_TM ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_TP_CD ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_LOC_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_LOC_TP_CD ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_RSN_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_RSN_TP_CD ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_CRCT_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_CRCT_TP_CD ,STH_SUB.SVC_TASK_REL_USR_ID AS CLTR_PSN_CD ,'02' AS SVC_MGR_TP_CD
,ST.LATE_START_TS AS LATE_START_TS
FROM SVC_TASK_STS STS ,SVC_TASK ST ,FSR F ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,MDL_NM MN ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO ,( $searchCondition00$ ) FV_SUB ,( $searchCondition01$ ) FVT_SUB ,( $searchCondition02$ ) STH_SUB ,( $searchCondition03$ ) SM_SUB WHERE $searchCondition04$ $searchCondition05$ $searchCondition07$
UNION ALL SELECT
/*+ DYNAMIC_SAMPLING(MN 5) */
ST.SVC_TASK_RCV_DT AS SVC_TASK_RCV_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_CLO_DT AS SVC_TASK_CLO_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_STS_CD AS SVC_TASK_STS_CD ,ST.SVC_TASK_REJ_DT AS SVC_TASK_REJ_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_APVL_DT AS SVC_TASK_APVL_DT ,ST.SVC_RSP_TM_NUM AS SVC_RSP_TM_NUM ,FV_SUB.TECH_CD AS TECH_CD ,STS.OPEN_TASK_FLG AS OPEN_TASK_FLG ,CASE WHEN STH_SUB.SVC_TASK_REL_FLG IS NOT NULL THEN STH_SUB.SVC_TASK_REL_FLG WHEN HLD.FSR_VISIT_STS_CD = #pendingPo# THEN 'N' END AS SVC_TASK_REL_FLG ,SMM.DS_KEY_ACCT_FLG AS DS_KEY_ACCT_FLG ,F.SVC_CALL_SRC_TP_CD AS SVC_CALL_SRC_TP_CD ,SP.PSN_CD AS SVC_MGR_PSN_CD ,SO.UNIQ_ORG_LAYER_NUM AS MGR_ORG_LAYER_NUM ,SO.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,SO.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,SO.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,SO.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,SO.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,SO.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,SO.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,SO.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,SO.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,SO.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,SO.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,SO.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,SO.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,SO.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,SO.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,SO.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,SO.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,SO.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,SO.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,SO.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,SO.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,SO.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM ,ST.FSR_NUM AS FSR_NUM ,ST.SVC_TASK_NUM AS SVC_TASK_NUM ,F.ITT_NUM AS ITT_NUM ,F.FSR_STS_CD AS FSR_STS_CD ,FV_SUB.FSR_VISIT_STS_CD AS FSR_VISIT_STS_CD ,ST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AS SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,ST.SER_NUM AS SER_NUM ,MN.T_MDL_ID AS MDL_ID ,ST.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD ,ST.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD AS SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,ST.SO_NUM AS SO_NUM ,ST.CUST_TEL_NUM AS CUST_TEL_NUM ,SMM.BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_FROM_TM AS BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_FROM_TM ,SMM.BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_TO_TM AS BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_TO_TM ,ST.SVC_TASK_RCV_TM AS SVC_TASK_RCV_TM ,ST.DS_SVC_CALL_TP_CD AS DS_SVC_CALL_TP_CD ,ST.SVC_BILL_TP_CD AS SVC_BILL_TP_CD ,SM_SUB.SVC_CMNT_TXT AS SVC_CMNT_TXT ,ST.SVC_TASK_CPLT_DT AS SVC_TASK_CPLT_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_CPLT_TM AS SVC_TASK_CPLT_TM ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_TP_CD ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_LOC_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_LOC_TP_CD ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_RSN_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_RSN_TP_CD ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_CRCT_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_CRCT_TP_CD ,STH_SUB.SVC_TASK_REL_USR_ID AS CLTR_PSN_CD ,'01' AS SVC_MGR_TP_CD ,ST.LATE_START_TS AS LATE_START_TS FROM SVC_TASK_STS STS ,SVC_TASK ST ,FSR F ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,MDL_NM MN ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO ,( $searchCondition00$ ) FV_SUB ,( $searchCondition01$ ) FVT_SUB ,( $searchCondition02$ ) STH_SUB ,( $searchCondition03$ ) SM_SUB ,HLD_TASK HLD WHERE $searchCondition04$ $searchCondition05$ $searchCondition08$ UNION ALL SELECT
/*+ DYNAMIC_SAMPLING(MN 5) */
ST.SVC_TASK_RCV_DT AS SVC_TASK_RCV_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_CLO_DT AS SVC_TASK_CLO_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_STS_CD AS SVC_TASK_STS_CD ,ST.SVC_TASK_REJ_DT AS SVC_TASK_REJ_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_APVL_DT AS SVC_TASK_APVL_DT ,ST.SVC_RSP_TM_NUM AS SVC_RSP_TM_NUM ,FV_SUB.TECH_CD AS TECH_CD ,STS.OPEN_TASK_FLG AS OPEN_TASK_FLG ,CASE WHEN STH_SUB.SVC_TASK_REL_FLG IS NOT NULL THEN STH_SUB.SVC_TASK_REL_FLG WHEN HLD.FSR_VISIT_STS_CD = #pendingPo# THEN 'N' END AS SVC_TASK_REL_FLG ,SMM.DS_KEY_ACCT_FLG AS DS_KEY_ACCT_FLG ,F.SVC_CALL_SRC_TP_CD AS SVC_CALL_SRC_TP_CD ,SP.PSN_CD AS SVC_MGR_PSN_CD ,SO.UNIQ_ORG_LAYER_NUM AS MGR_ORG_LAYER_NUM ,SO.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,SO.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,SO.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,SO.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,SO.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,SO.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,SO.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,SO.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,SO.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,SO.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,SO.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,SO.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,SO.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,SO.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,SO.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,SO.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,SO.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,SO.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,SO.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,SO.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,SO.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,SO.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM ,ST.FSR_NUM AS FSR_NUM ,ST.SVC_TASK_NUM AS SVC_TASK_NUM ,F.ITT_NUM AS ITT_NUM ,F.FSR_STS_CD AS FSR_STS_CD ,FV_SUB.FSR_VISIT_STS_CD AS FSR_VISIT_STS_CD ,ST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AS SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,ST.SER_NUM AS SER_NUM ,MN.T_MDL_ID AS MDL_ID ,ST.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD ,ST.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD AS SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,ST.SO_NUM AS SO_NUM ,ST.CUST_TEL_NUM AS CUST_TEL_NUM ,SMM.BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_FROM_TM AS BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_FROM_TM ,SMM.BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_TO_TM AS BIZ_HRS_MON_FRI_TO_TM ,ST.SVC_TASK_RCV_TM AS SVC_TASK_RCV_TM ,ST.DS_SVC_CALL_TP_CD AS DS_SVC_CALL_TP_CD ,ST.SVC_BILL_TP_CD AS SVC_BILL_TP_CD ,SM_SUB.SVC_CMNT_TXT AS SVC_CMNT_TXT ,ST.SVC_TASK_CPLT_DT AS SVC_TASK_CPLT_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_CPLT_TM AS SVC_TASK_CPLT_TM ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_TP_CD ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_LOC_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_LOC_TP_CD ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_RSN_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_RSN_TP_CD ,FVT_SUB.SVC_PBLM_CRCT_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_CRCT_TP_CD ,STH_SUB.SVC_TASK_REL_USR_ID AS CLTR_PSN_CD ,'02' AS SVC_MGR_TP_CD ,ST.LATE_START_TS AS LATE_START_TS FROM SVC_TASK_STS STS ,SVC_TASK ST ,FSR F ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,MDL_NM MN ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO ,( $searchCondition00$ ) FV_SUB ,( $searchCondition01$ ) FVT_SUB ,( $searchCondition02$ ) STH_SUB ,( $searchCondition03$ ) SM_SUB ,HLD_TASK HLD WHERE $searchCondition04$ $searchCondition05$ $searchCondition09$

SELECT B.PSN_CD ,A.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,A.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,A.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,A.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,A.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,A.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,A.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,A.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,A.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,A.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,A.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,A.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,A.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,A.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,A.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,A.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,A.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,A.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,A.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,A.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM FROM S21_ORG A ,ORG_FUNC_ASG B WHERE $searchCondition00$ ORDER BY A.SCD_ORG_CD NULLS FIRST ,A.THIRD_ORG_CD NULLS FIRST ,A.FRTH_ORG_CD NULLS FIRST ,A.FIFTH_ORG_CD NULLS FIRST ,A.SIXTH_ORG_CD NULLS FIRST ,A.SVNTH_ORG_CD NULLS FIRST ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_CD NULLS FIRST ,A.NINTH_ORG_CD NULLS FIRST ,A.TENTH_ORG_CD NULLS FIRST ,A.ELVTH_ORG_CD NULLS FIRST

AND OSTD.THIRD_ORG_CD = #thirdOrgCd#
AND OSTD.FRTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.FRTH_ORG_CD = #frthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.FIFTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.FIFTH_ORG_CD = #fifthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.SIXTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.SIXTH_ORG_CD = #sixthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.SVNTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.SVNTH_ORG_CD = #svnthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.EIGHTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.EIGHTH_ORG_CD = #eighthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.NINTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.NINTH_ORG_CD = #ninthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.TENTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.TENTH_ORG_CD = #tenthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.ELVTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.ELVTH_ORG_CD = #elvthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.TO_BE_OPTM_TASK_FLG = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS SCHD_TASK_CNT FROM OPEN_SVC_TASK_DTL OSTD WHERE OSTD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND OSTD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND OSTD.OPEN_TASK_TS = #sysDt# AND OSTD.SVC_MGR_TP_CD = #svcMnrTpCd# AND OSTD.SVC_MGR_PSN_CD = #svcMgrPsnCd# AND OSTD.FIRST_ORG_CD = #firstOrgCd# AND OSTD.SCD_ORG_CD = #scdOrgCd#
AND OSTD.THIRD_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.THIRD_ORG_CD = #thirdOrgCd#
AND OSTD.FRTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.FRTH_ORG_CD = #frthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.FIFTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.FIFTH_ORG_CD = #fifthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.SIXTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.SIXTH_ORG_CD = #sixthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.SVNTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.SVNTH_ORG_CD = #svnthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.EIGHTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.EIGHTH_ORG_CD = #eighthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.NINTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.NINTH_ORG_CD = #ninthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.TENTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.TENTH_ORG_CD = #tenthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.ELVTH_ORG_CD IS NULL
AND OSTD.ELVTH_ORG_CD = #elvthOrgCd#
AND OSTD.SCHD_TASK_FLG = 'Y'
SELECT A.MGR_ORG_LAYER_NUM FROM OPEN_SVC_TASK_DTL A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.SVC_MGR_PSN_CD = #psnCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM = 1
